short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publisher Champ assistant is a tool that helps users synchronize all their publishing platforms into Publisher Champ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
https://www.publisherchamp.com/ 
Publisher Champ is a platform that helps you track your book publishing royalties and spending across multiple platforms.
You can track your:
    - Book Sales
    - KENP reads
    - Book reviews
    - AD spending
    - Net profits
and get notified when any changes are identified on your sales report!
